Negative_Review: I think that the hotel is more for business travellers Family friendly but atmosphere shows that you need to be really quiet Kids playing at the common areas noise may be an issue
Positive_Review: This is the second time that we stayed in the property The rooms are very modern now plus the bathroom is big for European standards

Everything about our stay was amazing very friendly and helpful staff beautiful and comfortable room and an excellent location right near the metro We stayed as a family of 6 and everyone was comfortable and well looked after Delicious breakfast that catered for us all with superb service Thank you for making our stay in Paris just perfect

Negative_Review: No microwave You eat at great restaurants and end up with leftovers you can not reheat
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and helpful The hotel was beautiful and in a great location I was married and Paris and it was my first time there I had a great time Only thing is I wish they had a microwave to heat up our leftovers from restaurants we went to But it was great otherwise

Negative_Review: Very expensive and poor breakfast You can find many coffee bar and have breakfast less than 5euro Donot buy breakfast in the hotel
Positive_Review: Good location friendly staff
Staff very attentive nothing too much trouble Good location for key tourist sites Some great eateries in immediate area Deli cafe s resteraunts Also right next to Metro station

Negative_Review: The courtyard had people coming to it so sometimes they could make noise for you while you are n your room sleeping Breakfast room depending where you are sitting is a bit tight
Positive_Review: Location near to the Arc de Triomph metro and as well the city tour bus stop Breakfast was great Rooms were very comfortable and the bathrooms were quite spacious our rooms had a mini courtyard before entering the main building I would definetly recommend this hotel

Staff were unprecedented in their ability to make one feel comfortable The hotel is in a perfect quiet location Easy walking Grocery store across the street Can t say enough about the staff the hotel and the location Stayed 5 nights in a prestige room with my 86 year old mother Wonderful time
Loved everything about this property Incredible location quiet and comfortable rooms friendly and accommodating staff spacious bathrooms and fluffy towels

Negative_Review: Breakfast could use more variety Our superior double room opens to the terrace which was a slight discomfort in this cold weather
Positive_Review: Good location staff and cleanliness

Negative_Review: Cold room and the door of the shower was broken which made the shower experience very frustrating The occasion was an evening after my wedding party Also there was a daily fee not informed and completely non sense
Positive_Review: Nice and neaty room Cosy and comfortable Was inside the expectations

Negative_Review: Only thing that could have been better was having my reading light working we were told that it couldn t be repaired until Monday the day we were leaving which meant that any time I had to get up in the night I had to switch on main light which woke my friend up as well
Positive_Review: The staff couldn t do enough for us the location was 2 minutes from the Arc de Triomphe and a short walk from the Champs Elysee there were wonderful restaurants near by and staff were happy to book a table for us beds were very comfortable The manager emailed us before we arrived to ask us what we would like and how they could make our stay perfect we had information sent to us to review prior to our arrival about restaurants famous sights and monuments and how to get to them and how to get to the hotel from Gare de Nord which helped us plan our trip in more detail saving us time when we got there Everything really

Negative_Review: Elevator is very small Max 2 people and you can hear your neighbors coughing in the next room
Positive_Review: Clean Staff Room Design Bed and pillows were super comfy location was another plus

From the moment I arrived room ready at 9am expecting to have a delayed room vacancy due to arrival straight in The 2 ladies on reception were amazing perfect hospitality and committed to knowing I was happy with what I had booked from the introduction so friendly and polite in both Francois and English

This was my second maybe third stay at Hotel Balmoral and each stay I enjoy it more and more From the staff at the front desk who are very accommodating professional and friendly to the dining staff and room attendants they all go overboard to make my stay comfortable and welcoming The hotel lobby is a very comfortable and relaxing environment to organize your day while having a cup of coffee tea which is always offered by the dining staff or you can have a wonderful breakfast with a large assortment choices The breakfast dining room is attractive and the staff very attentive in a kind and courteous manner Thank you Anthony and the rest of the team The front desk staff could not be more wonderful and helpful with answers to questions directions and just asking about your day in Paris They always make sure to greet you in the morning evening or anytime throughout the day Thanks for all your assistance smiles and bearing with our awful French pronunciations You re just the best Anne Claire Madeline Aurora Entiene sp and Cheyenne The rooms are decorated very nicely and the beds make for a very comfortable nights sleep The bathrooms are modern and offer all the necessary amenities The bedroom slippers are a nice touch The hotel location is extremely convenient to the metro and the Le Direct shuttle bus to either Paris airport And lastly I find the location of the hotel to be very safe and convent to several nice restaurants Thanks to all for another GREAT stay See you soon Robert C Room 39

Negative_Review: Parking is difficult room is quite small couldn t fit kid bed so end up sleeping with us on the main bed
Positive_Review: Location amazing staff very friendly contenintal breakfast quite nice

Room bed really comfortable Friendly and professional staff especially reception staff Extra treat complementary tea coffee beer wine in reception area Easy travel from airport via train RTE 20 Euro pp return

Negative_Review: Could not be able to make late check out 12 30 pm makes our life tough as our plane was at 9 pm
Positive_Review: The hotel is very pleasant boutique hotel Everything was great Despite the fact that upon check in we could not get our room request in the booking however we have been upgraded to a suite which is a real plus to the hotel Staff are professional and perfect Everyone was prompt and great especially Anne Claire Location is superb Sure will come back

Negative_Review: The beds were way too soft and not good for the back a few nights in a row
Positive_Review: The two joining rooms on the top floor were perfect for a group of 5 Location was excellent

Very clean hotel tastefully decorated Excellent location 1 min walk from a major metro stop 5 min walk to the base of the Arc de Triomphe and a 10 min walk to the Champs lys es lots of places to eat around the hotel Extremely courteous and helpful staff who solved every problem and issue for us if there were any Rooms are big by Paris and European standards Absolutely no complaints and would repeat our stay here whenever we are in Paris Breakfast is good but could have been better but maybe since all other aspects of the hotel set such high standards we are being a bit harsh Lovely property and amazing hospitality from the staff

The suite was very spacious and well presented The staff were very welcoming and were able to accommodate our requests very quickly The location is ideal for shopping and sightseeing as well as jumping onto the metro

Negative_Review: Unfortunately thought the apartment would suit four adults better though it would have been fine if two were a couple
Positive_Review: The hotel was very nice as were the staff Location also very good I am told breakfast was very good also

Negative_Review: Skip the 18 Euro breakfast in the lobby if you re on a budget Plenty of decent fast food places nearby
Positive_Review: Excellent location on a quiet street tucked beside the Arch de Triomphe Tastefully appointed room and spacious state of the art bathroom The staff couldn t have been more friendly and helpful A great value for Paris lodgings
This is my second stay at Balmoral It is a comfortable resting spot while visiting Paris The location is perfect and the staff and breakfast wonderful I will return

The staff were extremely helpful They got our tickets for the museums recommended places to eat even got our boarding passes when we were leaving We will most definitely stay there again when next we visit Paris

Negative_Review: The night desk attendant wasn t as knowledgeable on how to get around the city as I would have expected He struggled to tell us how to get to a restaurant which was a couple blocks from The Eiffel Tower
Positive_Review: The staff prior to arriving was exceptionally helpful The room was clean The location is very good

This hotel was nice Very clean close proximity to the Arc de Triumphe and room was nicely decorated However we visited on our honeymoon which we advised the hotel of before arrival and this was never even acknowledged I wasn t expecting freebies but a congratulations on arrival would have been nice Not a big issue but it did deflate our initial excitement at arriving in beautiful Paris Hotel is quiet so this is a good base if you plan on being out all day and want a nice hotel to come back to in the evenings to sleep All in all we did enjoy our stay but would perhaps avoid for a special occasion
The location was perfect close to the metro The hotel was very clean and staff were warm and welcoming We were also upgraded to an executive room which was a cherry on top

The staff were very friendly and made me feel welcomed The room was small but clean and well organized The location is very near the Arc de Triumph and the metro very convenient for sights and city access

Negative_Review: Twin rooms in the hotel were overbooked upon arrival We have been unpleasantly pushed into queen sized bed but were given twin bed after some resistance We were two work colleagues traveling It just didn t feel right for such a place The porter was a story himself Should have more common sense
Positive_Review: Everything just perfect except for checking in experience

Negative_Review: The bed was a little too firm
Positive_Review: The baby cot was a wooden one which was much better than a usual travel cot The staff were very friendly and helpful Our room was lovely especially the bathroom for long baths We had a wonderful time

Negative_Review: The only negative side I would give is the special request I made through when booking special welcoming
Positive_Review: The staff are friendly nice and supporative The space of the rooms are great enough to put your luggages and sit happily The location is close to the train approximately 3 minutes walking

My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel between 21st 24th Decmber On check in the front desk staff were very helpful they spoke English and assisted us with our luggage The room was small typical for Paris but very clean and practical The front desk staff printed off our tour vouchers for us and gave us some advice on nice places to eat around the local area The location of this hotel is perfect Round the corner from the world famous Champs Elysee but yet still very quiet and peaceful There is a Metro station about 200yrds from the hotel entrance and a newsagents type shop 10seconds away Breakfast was good but I did expect a little more choice of hot food My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and will definitely be returning

Negative_Review: very small lift expensive breakfast didn t try it so cannot comment on quality small room no proper desk to work at
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed good shower quiet room fast free wifi location friendly staff received email before arrival asking if I had any special requests
Lovely hotel super location quiet Very friendly and helpful staff specially thank to Christian for excellent restaurants recommendation We definitely come again

Negative_Review: I can t remember things i didn t like
Positive_Review: Its not my first time here Staying in this hotel is the true paris experience The quite neighborhood even though the crowded champs lys es is a few steps away the parisien style the comfort its very worm feels home lovely staff very clean and simple And being rated as 4 stars is an advantage making it a luxury place without arrogance Its far from the noise and in the middle of the crowd i usually take the superior room of 20 m square which offers an elegant and spacious bathroom which is quite important for us as young couple the charles de gaulle etoile metro station is just down stairs giving you an access to all Paris The facilities in the room are so generous I strongly recommend this hotel specially for couples and of course it will be my choice each time visiting my beautiful Paris
The helpfulness of all the staff the e mail before you arrived asking you if you have any requests and the generous amount of tea and coffee in your room

Negative_Review: Rooms are quite small for 350eur night Even for Paris Having to leave the keys magn tico card when not at the hotel
Positive_Review: Customer service Wonderful reception team Fully renovated rooms specially showers Great for Paris stds
